description: Bridges: Type should be defined for param `customerReference` in method `Spryker\Zed\CustomerOfferConnector\Dependency\Facade\CustomerOfferConnectorToCustomerFacadeBridge::findByReference()`.
Bridges: Method findByReference() must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer;` signature.
